casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Shane SIMPSON, Defendant-Petitioner. C-622 September Term 2018
081655 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 8, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003635-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted and summarily remanded to the Superior Court, Law Division for reconsideration of the application of the Sex Crime Victim Treatment Fund (SCVTF) penalty, in light of State v. Bolvito , 217 N.J. 221 (2014). Jurisdiction is not retained.
